entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7 except minus 13 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 13 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
